name: Build Heroes:Idle Adventure
description:
Build Heroes: idle adventure is a building and survival game about family, friends, people, love, items, adventure, and exploration all over the world with RPG elements. Take your family and travel the world with many types of vehicles or boats. Build your home from scratch, protect people from zombies attacks, save other survivors, rebuild civilization, and explore the unknown magic world.

How to play:
Tap to build your own home.
Click to save people (heroes collect) and fight zombies.
Collect gold, fruits, and other resources by chopping trees & fishing &hunting & fighting.

Features:
A Mix of an adventure and an idle game.
Over 50 heroes and pets.
15 levels with various game scenarios, environments, and buildings to build
Hunting, Fishing, Collecting, Fighting, and Exploring.
Simulation of the day-night cycle of 24 hours.
Dynamic weather change includes sunny, raining, lightning, snow, dust storm, and more.
No internet connection is required.
Cloud saving.
Single-handed making game.

Let's join the fun and become a great build hero!

build a raft survival
As an ambitious captain, you should have your own boat. You can build and upgrade your ship and home by swimming to collect team members, floating bottles, treasure chests, and other mysterious shipbuilding materials.

Build a house and expand your team
Save those who survived the sea, the survivors will become your team. The more crew members you have, the faster you build. Enjoy being the savior in the idle building games。
Can you make the idle hero live in the water house?

Idle world(SimCity)
This is a builder game, build your village into a city. Automatically build during the idle time while earning easy placement rewards, this placement creating game allows you to keep earning while offline!

Sail the sea searching for your raft parts, expand your territory and team to defeat ‘em all! Choose a color, fortify your raft with other pieces floating in the ocean and face your opponents head-on!

RealmCraft 3D
In our game you will find:
► Cows, pigs, fishes, colorful sheep, and other peaceful mobs;
► Strong Zombies and other hostile mobs;
► High game optimization and world generation for all modern devices;
► A large number of different foods and plants;
► Convenient and fully adapted touch controls;
In this game, your actions are limited only by your imagination! The game does not require any skills ― you can at all understand in the first minutes of the game. With our game, you can spend a good time everywhere and every time!
Features:
• Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine, or even a spaceship and the Eiffel Tower!
• Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.
• Choose your character!
• Animals adopt and play with animals! It's fun!
